message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its true value to be well above $8000. Considering this, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12000. This opportunity is tailored to maximize the return on your investment while ensuring long-term benefits for your venture. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or if you have any questions.
